name: The Stolen Kingdom
description:
You play a cat who wants to reclaim his kingdom stolen by the Vase King.
The Stolen Kingdom is a game developed on Unity in 3 months as a student project. It is composed of a team of 10 people.

3 GameDesigner & Programmer: Maxime Lejars, Thomas Pham, Nathan Pflier.

1 SoundDesigner : Emmanuel Doublier.

6 GameArtists : Romain Campargue, Paula-Charlotte Alonso, Antoine Coste, Manon Chaumette, Dumont Noémie, Sandrine Panarotto.

Controls:    Jump -> Space      ;       Z,Q,S,D or Keys Arrows for displacement.
